THANKS Snarla... Worked a treat

This works A1.
Download torrent
Install Power iSO. (I used 4.5) Open image use Dual layer DVD and burn slowly.
Insert into MAC and off you go.
Failed to add this torrent file (invalid torrent?)

Why is this only 6.66 GB while the other torrent is 7.51 GB?? They both say OS X 10.5... See:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4179024/Mac_OS_X_10.5_Leopard_Install_DVD_-_full_iso_image

If you dont want to burn it on disk, and use Image restore from Disk Utility, you must try to convert the ISO into a DMG.
you can try using this DMG converter, for example: http://sunsky3s.s41.xrea.com/dmgconverter/index.html

Unfortunately this file is 7.5GB not 6.66
This was just barely too large to fit on my 8gb NANO that I was using to install this on a macbook pro... & an 8GB thumb drive I just purchased only had 7.25, gay!
Does anyone know if I can maybe get rid of some of the packages in the optional install folder?
